speaker: President.
english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0312/2008 ) by Mrs Bowles, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on a coordinated strategy to improve the fight against fiscal fraud ( 2008/2033(INI) ).
original: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0312/2008 ) by Mrs Bowles, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on a coordinated strategy to improve the fight against fiscal fraud ( 2008/2033(INI) ).
agenda_item: Coordinated strategy to improve the fight against fiscal fraud (debate)
